description: Try our easy to follow Asian-Spiced Crumbed Cutlets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Asian-Spiced Crumbed Cutlets Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, cook the potatoes in a saucepan of boiling water for 5 minutes. Add the peas and cook for a further 8 minutes or until tender. Drain. Return to pan with butter and parsley. Roughly mash. Serve cutlets with pea mash.
